note: Sayer of things, do’er of stuff - itinerant troublemaker and security loudmouth. Director, External Technology Relations for Electronic Arts, Non-Resident Senior Fellow at The Atlantic Council. Supposedly told a really good story on Darknet Diaries for Episode #91. All opines are my own. RT/Fav/Follow≠Endorsement. Recovering systems engineer, and part-time policy wonk, I try to bring the reality of having “done the thing” to larger discussions by those trying to help steer the ship.
